name: Circle Of Chaos
description:
This is my first ever unity game. I want to learn more in the future about unity and c#. I don't have a mac or linux machine to test these versions of the game on, so there may be problems downloading those versions. I know the game is kinda rough too since it is my first game ever, so feedback would be appreciated that way I can keep the feedback in mind for my future games.The android version will be available soon, probably by tomorrow or wednesday.

Also, Credit to the planet Jupiter for letting me use his remixes and music. His youtube link:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7pSE1HaYbk1eBK6ixRsCfw

UPDATE: I made a update to all the versions and download links. I added android version and I fixed the score to where everytime you die and restart or go to menu, the score will reset to 0.
